game.name: Zoomalia
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, LAN PvP, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Build your own team of creatures and choose to battle solo or online in a strategic roguelite adventure. Fuse, evolve, prestige and mutate over 100 unique creatures as you destroy obelisks and fight for control of Zoomalia.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Build your own team of creatures and choose to battle solo or online in a strategic roguelite adventure. Fuse, evolve, prestige and mutate over 100 unique creatures as you destroy obelisks and fight for control of Zoomalia.
